description:
A man buys dreams that lead to wealth. A badger longs for a mother`s warmth.  A god promises health if people will stop tripping over his head.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Man Who Bought Dreams / The Badger of Eagle Mountain / Ishibumi-sama Heals Illness
Yume o Katta Otoko / Washiyama no Mujina / Byouki o Naosu Ishibumi-sama
夢を買った男 / 鷲山のむじな / 病気をなおす石ぶみ様
